# addressFilter

**Instance Property**

An filter that lists which address components to include or exclude in search results.

## Declaration

```swift
get addressFilter(): AddressFilter | null;
set addressFilter(value: AddressFilter | null);
```

## Discussion

For more information on address filter options, see [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/mapkit/AddressFilter].
